pkgmetadata.longdescription: # QURI Parts OpenQASMQURI Parts OpenFermion is a support library for using OpenQASM 3 with QURI Parts.Note: some gates (SqrtX, SqrtXdag, SqrtY, SqrtYdag) are not implemented yet.## Documentation[QURI Parts Documentation](https://quri-parts.qunasys.com)## Installation```pip install quri-parts-openqasm```## LicenseApache License 2.0
